author: jeff masson
comment: Once you set the size and y and Z of the data it looks very good just takes 5 min to play about with. Would love a notification count for the perfect face

author: Steve Mi
comment: Looks perfect on my M600. If I may request, please make the Alarm and Chrono into buttons to activate those functions.

author: Chris
comment: Can't find any customization options, losing some of the info into the black borders.

author: Daniel T
comment: Way too hard to customize layout for your watch. Should come with preset watch sizes.

author: Tim Massing
comment: Like the concept but can't find the customize app. UPDATE: found the companion app. Great old school face.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: You have to install it from the playstore on the phone and then you can find it in the wear companion app. If this not work please send me an email to bytecarousel@zarzutzki.de thanks

author: Julián García Castillo
comment: I have the old LG g watch and I can say this is the best watch face I've tried in these years.

author: drivesideways
comment: Looks cool but how do I adjust the settings???  Moto 360 2nd gen running 2.0

author: MD Paul
comment: How do you adjust the Custom layout/s? Thanks..

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Open The Android wear companion app on your phone and then tap on the gears over RetroLCD. Then is there the menu point custom layout adjustment, tap on it and the you can activate it. To set the position/text size for the item you must select the item and change the value. Pease send me an email Info@bytecarousel.com or join the beta community.

author: Supramani Suppu
comment: MAYBE
title: MSBEW

author: Pete Qmico
comment: Cool. Easy to use

author: Doug Holt
comment: Ace face 😆😆😆

author: chris vann
comment: Brilliant on my smartwatch 3

author: Ki Talbot
comment: Cool, is it possible to display the month in a three letter style rather on numbers like FEB  instead of 02? Still a cool face  Edit: later on that day it was added! :) amazing thanks 👍

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content:
Thanks for your rating.
I will add that option with the next update. It is Development. ;-)

author: Shoakbar Xamidov
comment: Thx good watchface it is works

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Please send me an Email or join the g+ community. So we could solve it

author: Kieran Hill
comment: Favourite watch face, use it all the time. Would be great if it showed phone battery and allow you to change some of the colours used

author: joshua graham
comment: Display too big for Zenwatch 2

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Hello, could you please send me an screenshot to info@bytecarousel.com or post it in the g+ community under settings - about so we can fix it. What version of the ZenWatch 2 do you have. Thanks

author: Nicolae Jurcut
comment: Thx working and it looks nice.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Please update the watchface to the new version, it will fix the layout for the ZenWatch 2 large + Sony SmartWatch 3 and please Update the rating if it's good. If it's still not good enough send me an email info@bytecarousel.com﻿

author: Collin Willson
comment: Awesome

author: JLW Hein
comment: Update: creator fixed layout for ZenWatch 2 and it looks good again. Back up to 5 stars. I really loved this face and am happy the creator was able to resolve so quickly. It is back to being my daily watchface.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Please update the watchface to the new version, it will fix the layout for the ZenWatch 2 large and the rating if it's good. If it's still not good enough send me an email info@bytecarousel.com

author: Raes Aref
comment: Really digging this 👍

author: David Williams
comment: I love this retro look and that it provides the date and battery level that's accurate. With average use and brightness set to 1 with no ambient mode on this display easily lasts about 24hrs. I've done that a few times but I charge it before I go to sleep most times and it's at 20% then.
title: Classic look, low battery usage

author: Ethan Lee
comment: I had made the mistake of installing this watch face since day 1 and ever since, I was never able to find a better one. This is highly informational with battery percentage and looks retro cool. Thanks dev for making a great product!
title: Best Watch Face Ever

author: Aaron Ramsey
comment: Silly concept it may be, but it looks great. Could use some minor tweaks on the Moto 360, though; the edges get distorted by the tapered glass and it looks a little rough against the black background.

author: scorch 0z
comment: The 'water resistant' and other badges need to be toned down, they draw away from the great look. Weather and phone battery indicator would improve this
title: Works well, looks good

comment: This is my go to watch face right now on my Moto 360. Easy to read interface and like that is has the battery percentage. Could use a little bit of tweaking for the round watch face though.

author: M Mahmud
comment: It's remind me, my old casio watch, which is a classical watch from casio. Low battery use. Overall excellence experience so far. So five star.
title: No bad!!

author: Ryan Helmer
comment: I've lost count of how many watch faces I have tried over the past 2+ years and I always find myself coming back to this one.
title: Love it!

author: Miriah Mitchell
comment: I love the concept but it's totally off my my Zen watch. All the numbers are shifted too far right or too far down so I can't see them.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content: Please update the watchface to the new version, it will fix the layout for the ZenWatch 2 large + Sony SmartWatch 3 and please Update the rating if it's good. If it's still not good enough send me an email info@bytecarousel.com

author: Jeremy Tsuei
comment: It pays to read the app description, I suppose, but I downloaded this without knowing if it would be compatible with my G Watch R. Turns out it was.
title: No circular preview images...

author: Keith Adair
comment: But my battery life has been great since switching to this face. I'll update here if it sticks.
title: Could be a total coincidence

comment: I use this watch face the most, thank you to the developers and I hope you have a good week ahead.
title: Use this the most

author: Andrew Alleyne
comment: First impressions - this is great. Looks really nice, a touch of Tron (there's an idea...) in the neon blue ring. Just wish I could change the date format to EU format (DAY/MONTH) but, it's free and, so far, bug free.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content:
please update to the latest version 2.00.0
you can now choose the date format.

title: Back to the future

author: Geoff Smith
comment: Displays all you really need. I like it a lot and it's free, so no reason not to give it a whirl.
title: A superb watch face

author: Alan Zhao
comment: Tested on LG Urbane. It definitely provides a look and feel of the watches of the early 80's. Great idea. However, it uses more power. Look forward to improvement in later versions
title: Good design but battery consumption seems high

comment: Installed but not show up on screen or in wigets ! I TRIED AGAIN NO CLOCK NO WIDGET NO NOTHING ! DISSAPOINTED !
title: Reto lcd clock

author: Jimmy Crasto
comment: Ambient mode jst sucks it luks like a fake display on my Samsung galaxy gear live.
title: Not Gud

author: Daniel Schuler
comment: The number alignment is a bit off on the ASUS ZenWatch 2.

reply.author: Raimund Arning
reply.content:
please update to the latest version 2.00.0
Layout should now be fixed, if not please send me an screenshot
wiith selected Infotab - VERSION through E-Mail.

author: Gus MacLellan
comment: Very good looking watch face with all the details you need on it...looks like a classic digital watch face....love it!!
title: Smartest of the smart watch faces...

author: darren taylor
comment: I was looking for a good digital watch face for my lg urbane and this fits the bill - modern yet retro i would have gladly paid for this.  Thanks
title: Good watch face
